outputs.output_descr:
Access to justice is recognized as a critical issue by the Government of the Republic of Belarus. 
Through this project the Government of Belarus and the UN continue the joint efforts towards ensuring the rule of law and access to a fair trial for the population of Belarus.
The ultimate goal of the project is to ensure that the population of Belarus, including marginalized and vulnerable groups, enjoys access to justice through an effective and professional court system.
This will be achieved through support for the full-scale specialization of courts as prescribed in the constitution and the further improvement of the legislation concerning the court system.  Further to this goal, the project will contribute to the systematic and continuous professionalization of judges through life-long education.

project_descr: Facilitating the improvement of the court system in Belarus
project_title: FACILITATING THE IMPROVEMENT OF THE COURT SYSTEM IN BLR
